title: [1.16.4-1.11.2][DurabilityNotifier——耐久提示]轻量级耐久提示，低耐久时及时提示
author: Aikini
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Aikini 于 2021-1-16 20:04 编辑 

★ 简介 你可以收藏这个帖子以获得更及时的更新消息
这是一个特别轻量级的提示耐久用的客户端MOD，当你手中武器/工具耐久低时，它会发出警告，并且还有声音。你可以在配置文件中对它的声音进行修改，当然这需要一定的技术，你可以将它修改为药水的声音
后面会给出配置的详细信息
这个MOD对服务器是完全友好的，唯一不起作用的是GiveFatigue功能
Durability Notifier is a small client-side mod that uses various methods to notify the player when there tool is low on durability. It uses subtle methods like using sound or potion effects and is fully configurable via the in-game configuration menu for ease. So, you can configure the mod how you like it.

For more information on what settings are available see the detailed explanation for the configuration below.



The mod tries to stay as vanilla server friendly as possible. The only feature that doesn't work while connected to a vanilla server is the GiveFatigue feature.

★ 搬运授权 




QQ浏览器截图20190915142557.png (34.9 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2019-9-15 14:24 上传






★ 关于汉化 本MOD汉化文件需自行安装，下好MOD本体后右击以压缩文件的方式打开，进入assets/durabilitynotifier/lang，将汉化文件放入即可
zh_tw为繁体中文，zh_cn为简体中文
汉化文件链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1r6-OJS7nesGGU6c0aHMtBA 提取码: ezfm

★ 图片 这个提示消息会出现在物品栏上方




QQ浏览器截图20190915135145.png (5.76 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2019-9-15 14:26 上传






★ 配置的详细信息 
GiveFatigue - 玩家使用工具挖矿时会随着耐久的降低受到疲劳效果. (默认 false)
Percentage - 耐久提示的耐久百分比 (默认 10)
PlaySound - 当耐久达到上面那一项的百分比时，继续使用会发出声音警告 (默认 false)
SendMessage - 是否发送耐久提示 (默认 true)
SendMessageColor - 耐久提示的颜色 (默认 黄色)
soundlocation -指定播放的声音(路径)，如果路径不对会在日志中提示（必须将PlaySound打开，默认minecraft:block.note_block.pling）.
volume - 调节音量. (默认 0.6)
GiveFatigue - if true gives the player mining fatigue when the tool hit it's max so you won't accidentally break the tool. (Defaults to false)
Percentage - is the percentage from 1 between 100 of durability of the tool it checks for (Defaults to 10)
PlaySound - if true plays a noise to the player if they try to use their tool while it's low on durability (Defaults to false)
SendMessage - if true displays the message that your tool is low on durability (Defaults to true)
SendMessageColor - chooses what color/colour the message will be. (Defaults to YELLOW)
soundlocation - specifies the soundlocation of the sound that "PlaySound" will play. If the sound location inserted is false it will say so in the log.
volume - changes the volume that "PlaySound" uses to play the sound. (Def

★ 配置文件 

#基本配置
[general]
        #耐久提示的耐久百分比 [默认: 10] (1 到 100)
        #范围: 1 ~ 100
        Percentage = 10
        #当耐久达到上面那一项的百分比时，继续使用会发出声音警告 (可在配置文件中修改) [默认: false]
        PlaySound = true
        #耐久提示的颜色 (PlaySound必须打开) [默认: yellow]
        SentMessageColor = "yellow"
        #是否发送耐久提示 (PlaySound必须打开) [默认: true]
        SendMessage = true

#声音设置
[sound]
        #音量大小 [默认: 0.6] (0.6 to 5.0)
        #范围: 0.0 ~ 5.0
        volume = 0.6
        #指定播放的声音(路径)，如果路径不对会在日志中提示 (PlaySound必须打开) [默认: minecraft:block.note_block.pling]
        soundlocation = "minecraft:block.note_block.pling"

复制代码
作者在配置文件中有很多矛盾的点，我自己都纳闷了
英语：

#General settings
[general]
        #Sets the percentage the mod checks for [default: 10] (1 to 100)
        #Range: 1 ~ 100
        Percentage = 10
        #Change this option to let it play a sound (configurable in the sound tab) [default: false]
        PlaySound = true
        #Change this option to change the color / formatting of the message (if you have sound enabled) [default: yellow]
        SentMessageColor = "yellow"
        #Change this option to let it not display a chat message (if you have sound enabled) [default: true]
        SendMessage = true

#Sound settings
[sound]
        #Sets the percentage the mod checks for [default: 10] (1 to 100)
        #Range: 0.0 ~ 5.0
        volume = 0.6
        #Change this option to change the color / formatting of the message (if you have sound enabled) [default: minecraft:block.note_block.pling]
        soundlocation = "minecraft:block.note_block.pling"

复制代码

★ 更新日志（时间按本贴更新时间来写）2020年3月22日  1.15版本发布
2020年7月7日  1.16版本发布
2021年1月16日 1.16.3/1.16.4版本发布
